name: Crastino: A Kamuran Story (Jam Game)
description:
Crastino (Tomorrow in Latin) a Kamuran (Protagonist Name) Story is a platformer game. It shows a paradox. Our protagonist Kamuran is stuck in a paradox which is going on for ages. 

**Backstory** !!Read it before playing the game!!

One day Kamuran learns that he will be killer. And he hates his tomorrow version. This fury flames day by day. And one day he found an opportunity for catching his tomorrow.

***Spoiler***

He kills his tomorrow version and he becomes a killer. From now he waits for his yesterday version to kill himself. In future versions of the game, you will try to escape from this paradox by talking with your tomorrow or yesterday. And by minigames, you will try to catch your tomorrow and find some places that will bring you back to start of this paradox.

***Spoiler***
